Description_lang: Increases attack power by $41606s1 for $41606d. Counts as both a Battle and Guardian elixir.  This effect persists through death.Only active in Tempest Keep, Serpentshrine Cavern, Caverns of Time: Mount Hyjal, Black Temple and the Sunwell Plateau.
